rukus.text: Jadom suraja nu lapeta dita javega
Ate jadom tare prakasahina ho janage
Ate jadom pahara cala'e janage
Ate jadom dasa mahini'am di'am gabhana uthani'am avara phiranagi'am
Ate jadom sare jagali janavara ikathe kite janage
Ate jadom samudara (aga nala) bhataka dite janage
Ate jadom' iko tar'ham de loka ikathe kite janage
Ate ji'undi dafana kiti laraki tom puchi'a javega
Ki uha kisa phosa vica mari ga'i
Ate jadom karama patara khol'he janage
Ate jadom asamana khul'ha javega
Ate naraka di aga bhataka'i javegi
Ate janata nu nere li'anda javega
Hara ika bada jana lavega ki uha ki lai ke a'i'a hai
Maim sahu khanda ham unham piche hatana vale tari'am di
Calana ate chipa jana vale tari'am di
Ate rata di (sahu) jadom uha jana lage
Ate savera di jadom uha a'unna lage
Ki iha ika sanamanayoga sadesavahaka'te ho'i bani hai
Takata vale, arasam de malaka de kola uce daraje vala
Usa di gala mani jandi hai. Uha bharose vala hai
Ate tuhada sathi masatana nahim hai
Ate usa ne usa (pharisate) nu (asamana'te) pratakha (purabi kadhe te) vekhi'a hai
Ate uha gupata galam la'i zi'ada utasuka nahim
Ate iha phitakare ho'e saiaitana da bola nahim
Phira tusim kidhara ja rahe ho
iha ta sirafa sasara vali'am la'i ika upadesa hai
Usa la'i jihara tuhade vicom sidha calana cahe
Ate tusim kujha nahim kara sakade, paratu iha ki sasara da palanahara alaha cahe
